Quote.Author: Spike Lee
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm blessed, I can afford to send my children to private school

Quote.Author: Spike Milligan
Quote.QuoteValue: Contraceptives should be used on every conceivable occasion

Quote.Author: Spike Milligan
Quote.QuoteValue: My Father had a profound influence on me. He was a lunatic

Quote.Author: Spike Milligan
Quote.QuoteValue: Money couldn't buy friends, but you got a better class of enemy

Quote.Author: Spike Milligan
Quote.QuoteValue: A sure cure for seasickness is to sit under a tree

Quote.Author: Spike Milligan
Quote.QuoteValue: All I ask is the chance to prove that money can't make me happy

Quote.Author: Spike Milligan
Quote.QuoteValue: How long was I in the army? Five foot eleven

Quote.Author: Spike Milligan
Quote.QuoteValue: I can speak Esperanto like a native

Quote.Author: Spike Milligan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have the body of an eighteen year old. I keep it in the fridge

Quote.Author: Spike Milligan
Quote.QuoteValue: I shook hands with a friendly Arab. I still have my right arm to prove it

Quote.Author: Spike Milligan
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent many years laughing at Harry Secombe's singing until somebody told me that it wasn't a joke

Quote.Author: St. Jerome
Quote.QuoteValue: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best

Quote.Author: St. Jerome
Quote.QuoteValue: The face is the mirror of the mind, and eyes without speaking confess the secrets of the heart

Quote.Author: St. Jerome
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night

Quote.Author: St. Jerome
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend is long sought, hardly found, and with difficulty kept

Quote.Author: St. Jerome
Quote.QuoteValue: Why do you not practice what you preach

Quote.Author: St. Jerome
Quote.QuoteValue: The friendship that can cease has never been real

Quote.Author: St. Jerome
Quote.QuoteValue: Virginity can be lost by a thought

Quote.Author: St. Jerome
Quote.QuoteValue: Act as if the maxim of your action were to become through your will a be general natural law

Quote.Author: St. Jerome
Quote.QuoteValue: True friendship ought never to conceal what it thinks

Quote.Author: St. Jerome
Quote.QuoteValue: The scars of others should teach us caution

Quote.Author: Stacy London
Quote.QuoteValue: Your closet needs to be a place of joy and celebration of who are you now - not who you were

Quote.Author: Stacy London
Quote.QuoteValue: Any item in your wardrobe should satisfy one of two criteria: utility and joy

Quote.Author: Stacy London
Quote.QuoteValue: Style is joyful if you allow yourself to have joy

Quote.Author: Stacy London
Quote.QuoteValue: Never let a trend get in the way of creating a great outfit for yourself

Quote.Author: Stacy London
Quote.QuoteValue: Style can change your look, certainly, but it can also change your life

Quote.Author: Stacy London
Quote.QuoteValue: Only buy things that make your heart sing. If I don't love it, I won't buy it

Quote.Author: Stacy London
Quote.QuoteValue: Finding tricks to create flattering body shape is the key to style

Quote.Author: Stacy London
Quote.QuoteValue: Smart beauty is about looking your best and feeling your best and never overpaying for it

Quote.Author: Stacy London
Quote.QuoteValue: Less is more. I truly believe in buying a few pieces with better construction

Quote.Author: Stacy London
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't fit your clothes well and look your best if you don't know what you're working with

Quote.Author: Stan Laurel
Quote.QuoteValue: If any of you cry at my funeral, I'll never speak to you again!

Quote.Author: Stan Laurel
Quote.QuoteValue: Humor is the truth; wit is an exaggeration of the truth

Quote.Author: Stan Laurel
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a dream that I was awake and I woke up to find myself asleep

Quote.Author: Stan Laurel
Quote.QuoteValue: If you had a face like mine, you'd punch me right on the nose, and I'm just the fella to do it

Quote.Author: Stan Laurel
Quote.QuoteValue: If anyone at my funeral has a long face, I'll never speak to him again

Quote.Author: Stan Laurel
Quote.QuoteValue: You can lead a horse to water, but a pencil must be led

Quote.Author: Stan Laurel
Quote.QuoteValue: Another fine mess you've gotten me into

Quote.Author: Stan Laurel
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't deserve to be mentioned in the same sentence with Charles Chaplin

Quote.Author: Stan Laurel
Quote.QuoteValue: We had friendly and pleasant relationships with all that worked in our films - many happy memories

Quote.Author: Stan Laurel
Quote.QuoteValue: My only opinion on the Laurel and Hardy 'home movie' situation - I regret we have no financial interest in them

Quote.Author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
Quote.QuoteValue: You can close your eyes to reality but not to memories

Quote.Author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
Quote.QuoteValue: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art

Quote.Author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't trust the heart, it wants your blood

Quote.Author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
Quote.QuoteValue: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible

Quote.Author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
Quote.QuoteValue: Value your words. Each one may be the last

Quote.Author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
Quote.QuoteValue: The weakest link in a chain is the strongest because it can break it

Quote.Author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
Quote.QuoteValue: You must first have a lot of patience to learn to have patience

Quote.Author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
Quote.QuoteValue: The window to the world can be covered by a newspaper

Quote.Author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
Quote.QuoteValue: When you jump for joy, beware that no one moves the ground from beneath your feet

Quote.Author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes something worth doing is worth overdoing

Quote.Author: Stanley Marcus
Quote.QuoteValue: Consumers are statistics. Customers are people

Quote.Author: Stanley Marcus
Quote.QuoteValue: If you demand the best, sometimes you get it

Quote.Author: Stanley Marcus
Quote.QuoteValue: It ought to be self-evident common sense that service is important to sales. But it's not

Quote.Author: Stanley Marcus
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to sell, to visualize something for someone and make them see it

Quote.Author: Stanley Marcus
Quote.QuoteValue: Make life exciting, and you live longer

Quote.Author: Stanley Marcus
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm lucky that I was in retailing during the time that I call the golden age of retailing

Quote.Author: Stanley Marcus
Quote.QuoteValue: It was at the department store where people got away from provincialism

Quote.Author: Stanley Marcus
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a right way to sell and a wrong way to sell

Quote.Author: Stanley Marcus
Quote.QuoteValue: I already own more than any human being needs

Quote.Author: Stanley Marcus
Quote.QuoteValue: Other than things like toothpaste, I don't buy anything that isn't sold to me

Quote.Author: Stefano Gabbana
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the Weather Channel because my mood changes a lot according to the weather!

Quote.Author: Stefano Gabbana
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, flowers are happiness

Quote.Author: Stefano Gabbana
Quote.QuoteValue: In my whole life, I've worn black tie three times. I can't tie the knot myself

Quote.Author: Stefano Gabbana
Quote.QuoteValue: What the fashion system says and what the fashion customer says are really two different things

Quote.Author: Stefano Gabbana
Quote.QuoteValue: In life you need to take a risk

Quote.Author: Stefano Gabbana
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is OK for five days, one minute, six months, but style is for the rest of the life

Quote.Author: Stefano Gabbana
Quote.QuoteValue: Customers are very demanding and well informed

Quote.Author: Stefano Gabbana
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have the time to be bored

Quote.Author: Stefano Gabbana
Quote.QuoteValue: My memories are of denim. I remember being 12 in my Levi's. Wow!

Quote.Author: Stefano Gabbana
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a man, I'm not just a fashion designer

Quote.Author: Stella Young
Quote.QuoteValue: The killing of a disabled person is not 'compassionate'. It is not 'euthanasia'. It is murder

Quote.Author: Stella Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Apologies are great, but they don't really change anything. You know what does? Action

Quote.Author: Stella Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Disability doesn't make you exceptional, but questioning what you think you know about it does

Quote.Author: Stella Young
Quote.QuoteValue: If everyone's looking at me, I might as well say something interesting

Quote.Author: Stella Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a full-time wheelchair user. And yet, given the right circumstances, I am able to work

Quote.Author: Stella Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to think of myself in terms of who I'd be if I didn't have this pesky old disability

Quote.Author: Stella Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Disability is often framed, in medical terms, as the ultimate disaster and certainly as a deficit

Quote.Author: Stella Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Death is not treatment, even if it's medically facilitated

Quote.Author: Stella Young
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about living with any disability is that you adapt; you do what works for you

Quote.Author: Stella Young
Quote.QuoteValue: People with disabilities are simply part of diverse communities in the U.S

Quote.Author: Stendhal
Quote.QuoteValue: Only great minds can afford a simple style

Quote.Author: Stendhal
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't love me, it does not matter, anyway I can love for both of us

Quote.Author: Stendhal
Quote.QuoteValue: The more one pleases everybody, the less one pleases profoundly

Quote.Author: Stendhal
Quote.QuoteValue: One can acquire everything in solitude except character

Quote.Author: Stendhal
Quote.QuoteValue: People happy in love have an air of intensity

Quote.Author: Stendhal
Quote.QuoteValue: What is really beautiful must always be true

Quote.Author: Stendhal
Quote.QuoteValue: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love

Quote.Author: Stendhal
Quote.QuoteValue: All religions are founded on the fear of the many and the cleverness of the few

Quote.Author: Stendhal
Quote.QuoteValue: God's only excuse is that he does not exist

Quote.Author: Stendhal
Quote.QuoteValue: Pleasure is often spoiled by describing it

Quote.Author: Stephen Bannon
Quote.QuoteValue: An elite is someone who's for themselves and not for the country

Quote.Author: Stephen Bannon
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from a blue-collar, Irish Catholic, pro-Kennedy, pro-union family of Democrats

Quote.Author: Stephen Bannon
Quote.QuoteValue: Darkness is good. Dick Cheney. Darth Vader. Satan. That's power

Quote.Author: Stephen Bannon
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear is a good thing. Fear is going to lead you to take action

Quote.Author: Stephen Bannon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a commercial filmmaker

Quote.Author: Stephen Bannon
Quote.QuoteValue: Trump is a product of a seething populism and nationalism that is the driving political force

Quote.Author: Stephen Bannon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a white nationalist, I'm a nationalist. I'm an economic nationalist

Quote.Author: Stephen Bannon
Quote.QuoteValue: Facts get shares; opinions get shrugs

Quote.Author: Stephen Bannon
Quote.QuoteValue: To be brutally frank, I mean Christianity is dying in Europe, and Islam is on the rise

Quote.Author: Stephen Bannon
Quote.QuoteValue: I am Thomas Cromwell in the court of the Tudors

Quote.Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Facts matter not at all. Perception is everything. It's certainty

Quote.Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't prove it, but I can say it

Quote.Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Shamelessness is a wonderful part of the character

Quote.Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like books, they're all fact, no heart

Quote.Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Isn't an agnostic just an atheist without balls?

Quote.Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote.QuoteValue: I just think Rosa Parks was overrated. Last time I checked, she got famous for breaking the law

Quote.Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing wrong with being gay. I have plenty of friends who are going to hell

Quote.Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Status is always ripe for satire, status is always good for comedy

Quote.Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an actor. I hate to blow everyone's illusions

Quote.Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had free time to go to Los Angeles to shoot a movie, I would rather spend it with my kids

Quote.Author: Stephen Curry
Quote.QuoteValue: Drinking water is essential to a healthy lifestyle

Quote.Author: Stephen Curry
Quote.QuoteValue: You can play fast but not in a hurry. As a point guard, I can dictate that

Quote.Author: Stephen Curry
Quote.QuoteValue: We're going to have to work. We're going to have to play well. Nothing will be given to us

Quote.Author: Stephen Curry
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like people looking at someone else's image

Quote.Author: Stephen Curry
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to make it look easy, but the behind-the-scenes stuff is the challenge

Quote.Author: Stephen Curry
Quote.QuoteValue: Water is my drink

Quote.Author: Stephen Curry
Quote.QuoteValue: Control your own destiny! Control your own destiny!

Quote.Author: Stephen Curry
Quote.QuoteValue: It's kind of a weird process being pitched by the company you're already with

Quote.Author: Stephen Curry
Quote.QuoteValue: Honestly, I could care less about other people's opinions about me

Quote.Author: Stephen Curry
Quote.QuoteValue: I know what I do for my team and what my teammates expect of me on both ends of the floor

Quote.Author: Stephen Fry
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need you to remind me of my age. I have a bladder to do that for me

Quote.Author: Stephen Fry
Quote.QuoteValue: But happiness is no respecter of persons

Quote.Author: Stephen Fry
Quote.QuoteValue: Generally, we admire the thing we are not

Quote.Author: Stephen Fry
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents were marvelously educated people

Quote.Author: Stephen Fry
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we have all experienced passion that is not in any sense reasonable

Quote.Author: Stephen Fry
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe there is a God. If I were to believe in a god, l would believe in gods

Quote.Author: Stephen Fry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a bit of a coward, and lazy, oddly enough

Quote.Author: Stephen Fry
Quote.QuoteValue: Old Professors never die, they just lose their faculties

Quote.Author: Stephen Fry
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a cliche that most cliches are true, but then like most cliches, that cliche is untrue

Quote.Author: Stephen Fry
Quote.QuoteValue: When you've seen a nude infant doing a backward somersault you know why clothing exists

Quote.Author: Stephen Gardiner
Quote.QuoteValue: Land is the secure ground of home, the sea is like life, the outside, the unknown

Quote.Author: Stephen Gardiner
Quote.QuoteValue: Good buildings come from good people, and all problems are solved by good design

Quote.Author: Stephen Gardiner
Quote.QuoteValue: The frame of the cave leads to the frame of man

Quote.Author: Stephen Gardiner
Quote.QuoteValue: The mystery is what prompted men to leave caves, to come out of the womb of nature

Quote.Author: Stephen Gardiner
Quote.QuoteValue: The mandala describes balance. This is so whatever the pictorial form

Quote.Author: Stephen Gardiner
Quote.QuoteValue: The garden, by design, is concerned with both the interior and the land beyond the garden

Quote.Author: Stephen Gardiner
Quote.QuoteValue: It was only from an inner calm that man was able to discover and shape calm surroundings

Quote.Author: Stephen Gardiner
Quote.QuoteValue: In Egypt, the living were subordinate to the dead

Quote.Author: Stephen Gardiner
Quote.QuoteValue: Houses mean a creation, something new, a shelter freed from the idea of a cave

Quote.Author: Stephen Gardiner
Quote.QuoteValue: Georgian architecture respected the scale of both the individual and the community

Quote.Author: Stephen Kinzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Canada, Australia and New Zealand have apologised for their treatment of native peoples

Quote.Author: Stephen Kinzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Alliances and partnerships produce stability when they reflect realities and interests

Quote.Author: Stephen Kinzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Countries that control water are likely to be the big winners of the future

Quote.Author: Stephen Kinzer
Quote.QuoteValue: New media and mobile entertainment are revolutionizing the way people learn about the world

Quote.Author: Stephen Kinzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Emotion is always the enemy of wise statesmanship

Quote.Author: Stephen Kinzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans overthrew governments only when economic interests coincided with ideological ones

Quote.Author: Stephen Kinzer
Quote.QuoteValue: After World War II, the winds of nationalism and anti-colonialism blew through the developing world

Quote.Author: Stephen Kinzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Mexico needs schools, rural development, and an independent judiciary, not high-tech weaponry

Quote.Author: Stephen Kinzer
Quote.QuoteValue: No authoritarian leader cedes power easily or turns it over to bodies he cannot control

Quote.Author: Stephen Kinzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Sultan Beyazid considered his father's art collection decadent and ordered it sold at auction

Quote.Author: Stephen Sondheim
Quote.QuoteValue: Art, in itself, is an attempt to bring order out of chaos

Quote.Author: Stephen Sondheim
Quote.QuoteValue: A close-up on screen can say all a song can

Quote.Author: Stephen Sondheim
Quote.QuoteValue: The more restrictions you have, the easier anything is to write

Quote.Author: Stephen Sondheim
Quote.QuoteValue: The nice thing about doing a crossword puzzle is, you know there is a solution

Quote.Author: Stephen Sondheim
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a great audience. I cry very easily. I suspend disbelief in two seconds

Quote.Author: Stephen Sondheim
Quote.QuoteValue: I prefer neurotic people. I like to hear rumblings beneath the surface

Quote.Author: Stephen Sondheim
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone I used to play with has either given up or is dead

Quote.Author: Stephen Sondheim
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something inimical about the camera and song

Quote.Author: Stephen Sondheim
Quote.QuoteValue: Math and music are intimately related. Not necessarily on a conscious level, but sure

Quote.Author: Stephen Sondheim
Quote.QuoteValue: I fell into lyric writing because of music. I backed into it

Quote.Author: Steve Ballmer
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't have a monopoly. We have market share. There's a difference

Quote.Author: Steve Ballmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Linux is a cancer that attaches itself in an intellectual property sense to everything it touches

Quote.Author: Steve Ballmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never, honestly, thrown a chair in my life

Quote.Author: Steve Ballmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Great companies in the way they work, start with great leaders

Quote.Author: Steve Ballmer
Quote.QuoteValue: We will make our products work out of the box

Quote.Author: Steve Ballmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Amazon is a place where people don't want to work

Quote.Author: Steve Ballmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The NBA has made it clear they want fan bases to be able to keep their teams

Quote.Author: Steve Ballmer
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no chance that the iPhone is going to get any significant market share

Quote.Author: Steve Ballmer
Quote.QuoteValue: If we see an opportunity in the software/hardware seam, we're going to take it

Quote.Author: Steve Ballmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Our company has to be a company that enables its people

Quote.Author: Steve Blank
Quote.QuoteValue: The stock market clearly values companies that can deliver disruptive innovation

Quote.Author: Steve Blank
Quote.QuoteValue: As an entrepreneur, my problem was that I had too many ideas

Quote.Author: Steve Blank
Quote.QuoteValue: Describing something as the 'Woodstock of...' has taken to mean a one-of-a-kind historic gathering

Quote.Author: Steve Blank
Quote.QuoteValue: In winning companies, everybody pulls in the same direction

Quote.Author: Steve Blank
Quote.QuoteValue: The business model is both the starting point and the scorecard for Customer Development progress

Quote.Author: Steve Blank
Quote.QuoteValue: On Day One, a start-up is a faith-based initiative built on guesses

Quote.Author: Steve Blank
Quote.QuoteValue: Founders, presuming they know their customers, assume they know all the features customers need

Quote.Author: Steve Blank
Quote.QuoteValue: Part of Customer Development is understanding which customers make sense for your business

Quote.Author: Steve Blank
Quote.QuoteValue: At 19, I joined the Air Force during the Vietnam War

Quote.Author: Steve Blank
Quote.QuoteValue: Commencement Day has a sobering finality in that it's the end of the prescribed path

Quote.Author: Steve Buscemi
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't think I'd ever be able to do movies. That was for serious actors

Quote.Author: Steve Buscemi
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't matter what part I play, I try and commit myself 100 percent

Quote.Author: Steve Buscemi
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't matter so much where the material comes from, as long as it's good

Quote.Author: Steve Buscemi
Quote.QuoteValue: It wasn't until my senior year in high school that I started acting

Quote.Author: Steve Buscemi
Quote.QuoteValue: They're not supposed to show prison films in prison. Especially ones that are about escaping

Quote.Author: Steve Buscemi
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't matter to me what the genre is

Quote.Author: Steve Buscemi
Quote.QuoteValue: I usually get freaked out if I'm in a situation where a lot of people recognise me at once

Quote.Author: Steve Buscemi
Quote.QuoteValue: I always find that it's when a script is not detailed, then I have to do more work as an actor

Quote.Author: Steve Buscemi
Quote.QuoteValue: I like telling stories about people with problems. I can't really put it much simpler than that

Quote.Author: Steve Buscemi
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, it doesn't really matter how big the part is as long as the part is important to the story

Quote.Author: Steve Carell
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing to me feels as good as laughing incredibly hard

Quote.Author: Steve Carell
Quote.QuoteValue: In my wildest dreams I never thought - well, I never thought I'd work

Quote.Author: Steve Carell
Quote.QuoteValue: Taste in comedy, like fashion, changes all the time

Quote.Author: Steve Carell
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone is flawed and everyone makes mistakes and is culpable

Quote.Author: Steve Carell
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, what's funny to one person is not at all to someone else

Quote.Author: Steve Carell
Quote.QuoteValue: What kind of person would have a real craving for gummy worms?

Quote.Author: Steve Carell
Quote.QuoteValue: Steve Buscemi is hilarious. He's really, really good with improv

Quote.Author: Steve Carell
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe the coolest people are the ones who don't care about being cool

Quote.Author: Steve Carell
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a leading man... that's like saying, 'I want to be astronaut.' That's not going to happen

Quote.Author: Steve Carell
Quote.QuoteValue: It was kind of like they were just giving us a toy to play with, to do whatever we wanted with

Quote.Author: Steve Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a doctor. I just have a tremendous amount of common sense

Quote.Author: Steve Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem is, women have stopped setting the bar high

Quote.Author: Steve Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not really a relationship expert but... I'm an expert on manhood and what men think

Quote.Author: Steve Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't go forward and backwards at the same time

Quote.Author: Steve Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to be in a bad relationship to really understand what a great one is

Quote.Author: Steve Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot more to me than just funny

Quote.Author: Steve Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Other than my foundation - mentoring programs - everything I do is for money

Quote.Author: Steve Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a relationship expert. I'm an expert on manhood

Quote.Author: Steve Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: My father instilled in me to take care of my family. Show up even when you don't want to show up

Quote.Author: Steve Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: God has positioned me just this way to be just like I am, to say what I say how I say it

Quote.Author: Steve Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: The first crocodile I ever caught was at nine years of age, and it was a rescue

Quote.Author: Steve Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: No, snakes are no problem. I'd go to any country, anywhere, any snakes, not a problem

Quote.Author: Steve Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe sustainable use is the greatest propaganda in wildlife conservation at the moment

Quote.Author: Steve Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Crikey means gee whiz, wow!

Quote.Author: Steve Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, I'm a thrill seeker, but crikey, education's the most important thing

Quote.Author: Steve Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Where I live if someone gives you a hug it's from the heart

Quote.Author: Steve Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Every cent we earn from Crocodile Hunter goes straight back into conservation. Every single cent

Quote.Author: Steve Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: My field is with apex predators, hence your crocodiles, your snakes, your spiders

Quote.Author: Steve Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, I think it's an absolute disaster that Australia, the government, allowed kangaroo culling

Quote.Author: Steve Irwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a proud Australian, a very, very proud Australian

Quote.Author: Steve Lacy
Quote.QuoteValue: Saxophone is one thing, and music is another

Quote.Author: Steve Lacy
Quote.QuoteValue: The soprano turned out to sound to me like the right hand on the piano

Quote.Author: Steve Lacy
Quote.QuoteValue: You can work on the saxophone alone, but ultimately you must perform with others

Quote.Author: Steve Lacy
Quote.QuoteValue: Bamboo is not a weed, it's a flowering plant. Bamboo is a magnificent plant

Quote.Author: Steve Lacy
Quote.QuoteValue: I still love the whole history of jazz. The old things sound better than ever

Quote.Author: Steve Lacy
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it is in collaboration that the nature of art is revealed

Quote.Author: Steve Lacy
Quote.QuoteValue: Circumstances can be very important. Find the right people to work with

Quote.Author: Steve Lacy
Quote.QuoteValue: The potential for the saxophone is unlimited

Quote.Author: Steve Lacy
Quote.QuoteValue: I was spoiled by Monk's music because it was so good, so complete

Quote.Author: Steve Lacy
Quote.QuoteValue: It starts with a single sound. If there's something in that sound, then it's worth continuing

Quote.Author: Steve Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night

Quote.Author: Steve Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is a promise delivered already broken

Quote.Author: Steve Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: You want to be a bit compulsive in your art or craft or whatever you do

Quote.Author: Steve Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Talking about music is like dancing about architecture

Quote.Author: Steve Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that sex is one of the most beautiful, natural, wholesome things that money can buy

Quote.Author: Steve Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't have sex man. It leads to kissing and pretty soon you have to start talking to them

Quote.Author: Steve Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Chaos in the midst of chaos isn't funny, but chaos in the midst of order is

Quote.Author: Steve Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I like a woman with a head on her shoulders. I hate necks

Quote.Author: Steve Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: What is comedy? Comedy is the art of making people laugh without making them puke

Quote.Author: Steve Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, excuuuuuse me!

Quote.Author: Steve Prefontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: To give anything less than your best, is to sacrifice the gift

Quote.Author: Steve Prefontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Somebody may beat me, but they are going to have to bleed to do it

Quote.Author: Steve Prefontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: No one will ever win a 5,000-meter by running an easy two miles. Not against me

Quote.Author: Steve Prefontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Something inside of me just said 'Hey, wait a minute, I want to beat him,' and I just took off

Quote.Author: Steve Prefontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: What I want is to be number one

Quote.Author: Steve Prefontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody likes tainted victories

Quote.Author: Steve Prefontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: You probably choose x-country because you were too small to play football

Quote.Author: Steve Prefontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: To hell with love of country - I compete for myself

Quote.Author: Steve Prefontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the one who has made all the sacrifices. Those are my American records, not the country's
